content: **crochet shawl in drops vivaldi or brushed alpaca silk** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ measurements width at top approx 152 cm / 59 8 length mid back approx 100 cm / 39 4 materials drops vivaldi from garnstudio 100g colour no 21 khaki 50 g colour no 22 ice blue 50 g colour no 24 pale purple 50 g colour no 30 purple or use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio 100g colour no 15 light sea green 50 g colour no 14 light grey green 50 g colour no 17 light lavender 50 g colour no 10 purple drops crochet hook size 5 mm / us h gauge 1 diamond = approx 10 x 10 cm
